summary:
She is K'athia Ma' - She is a Conjuration user but also uses a sword She's kind of a spell sword. She is based on my very first RP Character.
<br />(furry friendly) :3
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]https://k61.kn3.net/EE36786B4.png[/img]
[b]

[font=Arial]Name: K'athia Ma'

Race: Khajiit Female

Voice: Female Young

Marriageable: Yes

Body: CBBEv3

Location: Windhelm - Temple of Talos

Class: Spellsword

Style: MagicHuman

Spells: Restoration & Conjuration Focused[/font][/b][font=Arial]
[/font]






[img]https://k61.kn3.net/F916C37CF.png[/img][/center]
